Host plant(s) within Iran .
Rosa canina
, abricotier, cerisier (
Prunus
spp.) (

); apricot, sour cherry (
Prunus
spp.), rose, dog rose (

;

, Rosaceae ), sind poplar, black poplar, white poplar (

subSubSection.paragraph:
synonym: guttipennis (Abeille de Perrin) 1904 : 213 (
Aurigena
);
Richter 1952
: 183 (morpha of
malachitica Abeille
de Perrin, 1896 ); Kubáň 2006 : 45 (new assignment), 349 .

Note. According to Kubáň ( 2006 )
P. malachitica Abeille
de Perrin, 1896 is a subspecies of
P . xerxes (
Marseul) 1865
, so the record of
P. lugubris transcaspica
in Southern-east Iran is doubtful. The records for
Populus
spp. as host plants (
Modarres Awal 1997
) are also doubtful.

Note. Records for Golestan and
Euphorbia
as a host plant in Sakenin et al . ( 2008 ) are doubtful,
Euphorbia
species are known to be the host plants for
P. cuprata
.
